markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stormfeather](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1034)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 176 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You're an expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1).
</row>

</column>

---

Even while affixed, this electric blue feather sways lightly in the air, as if always accompanied by a breeze. When activated, the talisman casts [_fly_](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) on you, though the duration is 1 minute. You can Dismiss this activation. If you do, you're affected by [_feather fall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=111).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Stormfeather

When activated, the talisman casts fly on you, though the duration is 1 minute. You can Dismiss this activation. If you do, you're affected by feather fall .
